articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war live: Moscow and Beijing ‘coming closer’ poses threat to Europe, says Nato chief - The Guardian
articles.description: Ben Wallace says UK has not made a ‘solid decision’ not to send fighter jets but Downing Street appeared to rule it out as not ‘practical’
articles.content:
Sending British fighter jets to Ukraine not right approach for now, says defence sec

articles.author: Gabriel Tan
articles.title: Shinji Kagawa can look back proudly on his time in Europe -- even if it was a tale of two halves - ESPN
articles.description: Although it did not end as well as it began, his 13 years in Europe is still something former Japan star Shinji Kagawa can be proud of.
articles.content:
If Shinji Kagawa's time in Europe was to be described with a footballing cliché, then it is perhaps most fitting to label it "a tale of two halves".
On Wednesday, his 13-year spell abroad officially… [+3489 chars]
